20686.「<cs_pchero> 任務 ご苦労。\n 近くに 別の任務が あったので\n:
<cs_pchero> Thanks for the assignment. I had
another mission nearby, so I came to check on
you.

20687.「なるほど……。ニシキ殿の言うとおり\n あれは ウェナ諸島内だけに棲息している:
I see... as you say, Nishiki-dono, that is a
monster named Pogoin' Penguin that lives only
in the Wena Islands.

20688.「これは 貴公の任務だからな。\n 私の手を借りずに 討伐してみせてくれ。:
This is your mission. You will defeat them
without my help.

20691.「<cs_pchero> 任務 ご苦労。\n だが あの程度の魔物に 手こずるよ:
<cs_pchero> Good job on your mission. But if
you can't handle a monster of that caliber, I
can't imagine what the future holds for you.

20692.「これは 貴公の任務だ。\n 私の手を借りようなどと 思うな。:
This is your mission. Don't even think of
asking for my help.

20695.「貴公の手並みは 見せてもらった。\n 戦いのウデも なかなかだな。:
I have seen your skill. Your skill in battle
is also quite good.

20696.「私は このエルトナ大陸でも\n 多くの魔物討伐任務を 果たしてきたが\n タッ:
I've been on many monster-killing missions
here in Eltona Continent, but I've never seen
Pogoin' Penguin.

20697.「なぜ この大陸に現れたのか 気になる。\n 衛士団ならば この魔物のことを\n:
I am curious as to why it appeared on this
continent. Maybe the Guardians would know
something about this monster...

20698.「貴公は カミハルムイ国へ戻り\n ニシキ殿に 依頼の完了を報告せよ。\n 私は:
You are to return to Kamiharmui and inform
Lord Nishiki of the completion of his request.
I am returning to Verinard.

20699.「遅いぞ 衛士団。なぜ すぐに来ないのだ。:
You're late, Guards. Why don't you come right
away?

20700.「ガハハハッ。そんなに 待たせたか？\n そっちの都合で 呼びつけたんだ。\n:
Gahahahaha. Did I make you wait that long? I
called you here for your own reasons. Please
put up with me for a bit.

20701.「……貴公らに 聞きたいことがある。\n タップペンギーという 魔物について\n:
I have a question for you. I want you to tell
me about a monster called Pogoin' Penguin.

20702.「教えるのはいいが……。\n その程度の 魔物のことならば\n ウェナ諸島を守る:
I'm happy to teach you, but that level of
knowledge about monsters is par for the course
for the guards who protect the Wena Islands.

20703.「そんなことも知らんとは\n 魔法戦士団は 足もとが\n おろそかに なってるん:
If you don't know that, then you're not
following in the footsteps of the
Armamentalist Corps, are you?

20704.「我が魔法戦士団は 世界を舞台にしている。 \n 貴公たちとは 守るべきものの大:
Our Armamentalist Corps is set on the world stage. You should know that we have a different size and responsibility to protect
than you.

20705.「はっ！ 聞いて あきれるぜ！\n オレたちが ウェナ諸島を守っているから\n:
Ha! I'm so sick of this! We're the ones
protecting the Wena Islands so the
Armamentalist Corps can get out!

20706.「ザイナー殿。衛士団の意見は 求めていない。\n 魔物のことを 教える気はあるの:
Mr. Zeiner. I do not seek the opinion of the
Guard. Are you willing to teach them about
monsters?

20707.「お前の担当地域の 魔物だったな。\n 教えてやれ ノーラン。:
That was a monster in your neck of the woods.
Tell him, Noran.

20708.「タップペンギーは このウェナ諸島で\n 独特の生態を持って 棲息している魔物で:
Pogoin' Penguin is a monster that lives here
in the Wena Islands with a unique ecology.

20709.「その魔物が ウェナ諸島の外に\n 棲みつくようなことは あるのか？:
Is there any chance that this monster will
ever make its home outside of the Wena
Islands?

20710.「それは ありえません。\n 気候の変化に弱いですし エサもないでしょう。:
That's not likely. They are vulnerable to
climate change and will have no food source.

20711.「なるほど 普通でないことは わかった。\n それだけ聞ければ 後は こちらで対:
I see. I understand that it's not normal. That's all I need to know, and we'll take care of the rest. You guys can go back to your
duties.

20712.「呼びつけておいて それだけか……。\n 帰るぞ ノーラン！:
You call me up and that's it... we're going
home, Noran!

20714.「いつまで 衛士などに 甘んじている。\n 我ら 魔法戦士団の一員となる決心は\:
How long will you remain a guard? Have you
made up your mind yet to become a member of
our Armamentalist Corps?

20716.「待たせて すまなかった <pc>。\n 貴公の任務は 完了している。:
Sorry for the wait, <pc>. Your
mission is complete.

20717.「では 報酬を受け取ってくれ。\n 貴公には これが似合う魔法戦士に\n なって:
Then accept your reward. I hope you will
become an armamentalist who looks good in
this.

20718.「では 報酬を受け取ってくれ。: Then you will receive your reward.

20719.「タップペンギーの件については\n こちらで 調べておこう。\n 結果によっては:
I will look into Pogoin' Penguin's case here.
Depending on the outcome, we may need your
cooperation.

20720.「調査には 時間を要するかもしれない。\n それまで 貴公は 独自に修行を積み\:
It may take some time to investigate. Until
then, you are to train yourself and become an
armamentalist and come back here again.
